page.title: 13BADLUARACH/SCORAIG-PEOPLE
page.content: THERE HAVE BEEN MANY CHANGES DURING THE LAST 50yrs.IN THE 1930s THERE WERE AROUND 80 PEOPLE LIVING IN 13 HOUSE- HOLDS,BUT THERE ARE NOW ONLY ABOUT 19 PEOPLE LIVING IN BADLUARACH. THERE ARE ONLY 4 PEOPLE WHO HAVE LIVED IN BADLUARACH ALL THEIR LIVES. THERE IS AT TOTAL OF 6 GAELIC SPEAKERS THERE. ONE FAMILY OF INCOMERS IS FROM THE OUTER HEBRIDES.OTHERS COME FROM THE SOUTH OF SCOTLAND AND ENGLAND AND WALES. SIMILARLY,ON SCORAIG ON THE OTHER SIDE OF THE LOCH,THE POPULATION HAS DROPPED CONSIDERABLY.BY THE EARLY SIXTIES ALL THE OLD CROFTERS HAD LEFT THEIR CROFTS TO LIVE SOMEWHERE ELSE. FROM 1963 ONWARDS NEWCOMERS STARTED TO SETTLE ON SCORAIG AND THERE ARE NOW ABOUT 60 PEOPLE LIVING IN 18 HOUSEHOLDS.
